body_html: @jppgks the eager GAN example was merged and should make it to github very soon. Though it does not use implicit_value_and_gradients because it wants to compute multiple gradients over the same computation. What issue are you facing?
body_text: @jppgks the eager GAN example was merged and should make it to github very soon. Though it does not use implicit_value_and_gradients because it wants to compute multiple gradients over the same computation.  What issue are you facing?
body: @jppgks the eager GAN example was merged and should make it to github very soon. Though it does not use `implicit_value_and_gradients` because it wants to compute multiple gradients over the same computation.  What issue are you facing?
